Instance.description: Interaction that allows a Sim to begin crafting a recipe autonomously. This is never available user-directed.

TunableList.name: bucks_price_multipliers
TunableList.description: Mapping of buck type to tested multiplier to apply to the bucks price of the item.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Buck type to apply price multiplier to.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Tested multipliers to apply to the bucks price of the item.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

Tunable.name: check_fridge_shared_inventory
Tunable.description: If checked, look through the fridge shared inventory for gathering ingredients.

Tunable.name: check_sim_inventory
Tunable.description: If checked, look through the sims's inventory for gathering ingredients.

Tunable.name: check_target_inventory
Tunable.description: If checked, look through the target object's inventory for gathering ingredients.

TunableVariant.name: craft_for_other_sims
TunableVariant.description: Options for crafting this drink for other sims.

TunableTuple.name: craft_for_specific_participant
TunableTuple.description: Craft for the Sim of a specific participant type.

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: The specific participant that we want to craft for.

TunableTuple.name: no_other_sims
TunableTuple.description: Don't craft this for any other sims.

TunableTuple.name: party_crafting
TunableTuple.description: Craft for all for the Sims in a rally source.

TunableList.name: rally_source
TunableList.description: A list of different sources that we want to use to figure out the Sims to craft drinks for.

TunableVariant.name: funds_source
TunableVariant.description: When deducting the cost of the recipe, it will be deducted from this funds source.

Tunable.name: allow_credits
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will permit negative payments (credits).

TunableEnum.name: bucks_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of Bucks to pay.

Tunable.name: require_full_amount
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will subtract whatever funds are available if there are not enough funds.

TunableTuple.name: business
TunableTuple.description: Payment source is the active retail lot. If there is no active retail lot, will use household funds.

Tunable.name: allow_credits
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will permit negative payments (credits).

TunableEnum.name: funds_category
TunableEnum.description: If defined, this expense is categorized and can be displayed in the Retail finance dialog.

Tunable.name: require_full_amount
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will subtract whatever funds are available if there are not enough funds.

TunableTuple.name: household
TunableTuple.description: Payment source is the provided sim's household funds.

Tunable.name: allow_credits
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will permit negative payments (credits).

Tunable.name: require_full_amount
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will subtract whatever funds are available if there are not enough funds.

TunableTuple.name: statistic
TunableTuple.description: Payment source is a statistic on a participant

Tunable.name: allow_credits
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will permit negative payments (credits).

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant whose statistic should be used to pay

Tunable.name: require_full_amount
Tunable.description: If False, the payment element will subtract whatever funds are available if there are not enough funds.

Tunable.name: statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic that should be used to pay.

TunableTuple.name: price_multiplier
TunableTuple.description: Tested multipliers to apply to the price of the item.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: recipes
TunableList.description: The recipes a Sim can craft.

Tunable.name: set_target_as_current_ico
Tunable.description:
After creating the crafting component, if this is checked, the value of current_ico on the crafting_process will be set to the target.
This is a way to make an object that we are not creating as an ICO to behave a bit like an ICO. By setting the current_ico to the target it allows the crafting interactions to return the target as the carry target, enabling the non ICO object to be carried to where it needs to be.
For an example of when you might want to set this consider the Kave bowl. The Kava Bowl acts as both an ICO and a Final Product that holds individual servings. The only way to carry the Kava Bowl to the correct place to run the interaction is to set the current_ico to the kava bowl despite it not actually being a traditional ICO.

TdescFragTag.name: test_reserve_object
TdescFragTag.description: The reservation type to use when testing for this interaction's autonomous availability.
